description: The Graphic Design program at ESPOL provided a strong foundation in visual communication, digital media, and design principles. I gained hands-on experience in branding, illustration, and multimedia, developing skills that enable me to craft compelling, visually impactful designs for diverse media platforms.

The Game Development program at NBCC equipped me with practical skills in game design, programming, and production. Through team projects, I developed strong collaboration and problem-solving abilities, preparing me to contribute creatively and technically to the fast-paced gaming industry.

In BrainStation's Software Engineering bootcamp, I learned key software engineering concepts and computer science fundamentals. I gained hands-on experience with HTML, CSS, Terminal, React, MySQL, and I learned to create multi-page web products from scratch using tools like BEM, Flexbox, Sass, and Git.

Developing, managing, and optimizing online platforms to ensure they are user-friendly and aligned with organizational goals. Responsible for monitoring platform performance and making data-driven recommendations using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and CMS.

Designed and implemented layouts and graphic materials for software projects. Collaborated with cross-functional teams and clients to publish content and documented strategies to improve user engagement.

institution: Centre for Research, Development, and Innovation in Computer Systems (CIDIS)
description: Created mock-ups, storyboards, and digital assets for academic platforms, ensuring alignment with branding guidelines. Helped minimize technical issues through structured testing and file management.

Managed gas station operations independently. Collaborated with colleagues during peak times, maintained attendance and provided excellent customer service while operating cash registers and handling daily balance.

institution: Faculty of Art, Design and Communications, ESPOL
description: Assisted in the technical maintenance and troubleshooting of equipment across five laboratories, ensuring smooth operation for students and staff.
